scripts.test: echo 'Use `npm run test-$os` where `$os` reflects your system.'; echo 'See `npm run` for the full list.' && exit 1
scripts.test-mac64: npm link; mkdir -p ~/.jsvu; echo '{"os":"mac64","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"]}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu && echo '{"os":"mac64","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"],"chakra":"0","javascriptcore":"0","spidermonkey":"0","v8":"0"}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu
scripts.test-linux32: npm link; mkdir -p ~/.jsvu; echo '{"os":"linux32","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"]}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu && echo '{"os":"linux32","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"],"chakra":"0","javascriptcore":"0","spidermonkey":"0","v8":"0"}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu
scripts.test-linux64: npm link; mkdir -p ~/.jsvu; echo '{"os":"linux64","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"]}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu && echo '{"os":"linux64","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"],"chakra":"0","javascriptcore":"0","spidermonkey":"0","v8":"0"}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu
scripts.test-win32: npm link; mkdir -p ~/.jsvu; echo '{"os":"win32","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"]}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu && echo '{"os":"win32","engines":["chakra","javascriptcore","spidermonkey","v8"],"chakra":"0","javascriptcore":"0","spidermonkey":"0","v8":"0"}' > ~/.jsvu/status.json && jsvu
